svg.script: const test = async_test('getIntersectionList() crash test'); window.onload = test.step_func_done(() => { docElement = document.documentElement; textarea = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml", "textarea"); textarea.setAttribute("class", "c1"); docElement.appendChild(textarea); object = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml", "object"); object.setAttribute("usemap", "#DivLogo-map"); iframe = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml", "iframe"); docElement.appendChild(iframe); var svg = document.getElementById('askedForIntersection'); var rect = svg.createSVGRect(); svg.getIntersectionList(rect, svg); });
